item.description:
$90/person; Early registration discount $70 per person if paid by Feb 14.

This Valentine's make the commitment to loving yourself more deeply!

Learn the elements of ritual and specific Tantra techniques which you can apply to your intimate life ~ with yourself, or with your current or future partner(s). Whether single or in a relationship, you can apply these tools to better attune to yourself and/or partner, enliven your connection, improve your communication, enhance your pleasure and open the gateway to ecstatic communion.

The first part of this workshop will be a series of whole-group playful exercises exploring movement, breath, sound and energy.

In the second part of the workshop you will be guided through a 10 step Sacred Tantric  Ritual ~ which if applied is guaranteed to transform your relationships!

This clothes-on workshop is appropriate for couples, singles and friends. There will be no nudity or explicit sexual activity. You may come with a partner or a friend, you may come alone and choose to work with one of the other participants, or you may choose to partner with yourself and deepen your practice of self love.

You will be guided through a beautiful, playful and profound step-by-step experience.

In this workshop you will learn:

  • the elements involved in creating a powerful ritual
  • how to transform the ordinary into the sacred
  • to ground and connect with your inner stillness and radiant Light
  • 5 techniques to become present and harmonize your energy with your partner (or future partner)
  • 2 playful exercises to awaken and delight in the senses
  • clothes-on, hands-off techniques for cultivating arousal
  • a technique to open the Inner Flute ~ preparing you for whole-body orgasm
  • a powerful technique to connect breath to breath, soul to soul
  • a transmutation technique to awaken the ecstatic response

You will leave this workshop with an experiential understanding of specific ecstatic Tantra techniques and a wide variety of tools to create your own individualized Sacred Loving Rituals at home.

Open to all, regardless of relationship status, gender identity or sexual orientation. No previous experience necessary. Beginners welcome!

Brynn Bishop is a Tantra Educator, Ritualist, and Intimacy and Empowerment Coach with over twenty five years experience in the field of body-mind integration. Her training in Massage Therapy, CranioSacral Therapy, Taoist and Hindu Tantric Practices, Meditation and Body-Oriented Psychotherapy provides a uniquely integrative approach to Conscious Relating and Sacred Sexuality. She is passionate about assisting others in increasing their capacity for Intimacy and Pleasure, and in accessing their full Aliveness and Passion!

For more info or to inquire about Private Coaching, contact Brynn via email (organizer) or call 415-244-1652. Schedule a FREE initial phone consultation!

What past students have said:

“Brynn is a master at making people feel safe... I got a lot out of this workshop, more than I expected. Intensely pleasurable and heart opening." - Tracy

“Thank you for such a wonderful workshop. It truly met my needs in a deep way, and I met some great people that I will stay in contact with. My soul was deeply nourished. I am eager to continue to expand my life through this spiritual path.” – Laurie

“This was a wonderful, comfortable way to learn about some of the Tantric principles. I enjoyed this very much. ” – Karen

“This was a very good course... The group leader Brynn was fantastic...” – Michelle
item.name: Tantric Ritual for Enhanced Connection
